name: NetSuite Dark Mode
description: Dark Mode for NetSuite, written in two days by Tyler Busby, Jose Saldana, Corey Cockerham for the NetSuite Austin 2020 hackathon.
additional_info:
This dark mode still respects your NetSuite theme choice, so if you want a truly dark mode experience, you'll have to go to üè†>Set Preferences>Appearance>Colors>Color Theme>Basic:Black.

If you have any areas of the website you'd like to request the dark mode be added to (there are a lot), or you have any critiques you'd like me to change, feel free to reach out
